newsArray.title: Footy player to sue AFL after 'catastrophic' concussion from head knock left him with hearing and memory loss
newsArray.description: A premiership-winning footballer is suing the Australian Football League after a sickening on-field head knock allegedly left him with permanent brain damage, hearing loss and suicidal thoughts
creator: josh alston

newsArray.title: Thomas Gase Guide: No mulligans — watch the Super Bowl
newsArray.description: My dad is almost 79 years old, which means he’s been alive for about 28,835 days. Which also means he’s played golf roughly 30,000 times in his life. His most memorable moment on the links? January 15, 1967. That day my dad and his friend had heard of some new game scheduled for the Los Angeles Coliseum. Tickets were pretty cheap, my dad said. However, as my father also points out, the Green Bay Packers were by far the best team in football, and the AFL wasn’t considered important yet. So, of course, my dad and his buddies had an [...]
creator: thomas gase

newsArray.title: Sports News | FanCode Secures Exclusive TV, Digital Rights for ISL 2025-26
newsArray.description: Get latest articles and stories on Sports at LatestLY. A statement from the AIFF said, "The interim Managing Committee of the Indian Super League (ISL) and the RFQ committee, on Monday, February 2, 2026, selected the Broadcast and Production partners for the ISL 2025-26 season, which kicks off on February 14. The RFQ for the media rights was floated on January 18, 2026, with the bid submission deadline of February 1, 2026."
creator: ani
